story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right! Let’s call it a day!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You’d better thank your partner Pokémon for
working so hard!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Thanks so much for training with us!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: But man, you sure are strong, Blue!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: We could barely keep up even two-on-one!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Hahaha! I’m not about to step down and
lose to my protégés just yet!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But y’know what? You two have gotten
loads stronger since coming to Pasio!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Keep up the good work—until you can take
even me down!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Let’s give it our all too, Pikachu!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You two sure are good pals with your
Pikachu and Eevee, huh.
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I never see you apart. I almost envy how
close you are!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: I was looking for you, Chase!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Hey! How’d you know we were here?
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Yup! We met them here on Pasio!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
We’ve been training together, since we’ve
all formed sync pairs with Eevee or Pikachu!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Then...do you two wanna come train with
me, too? I’ll personally see to your training!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
If you spend all your time training us, you
won’t have much time for your own training.
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Actually, training you IS part of my training!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
The more formidable Trainers we have
around, the more I need to stay on top of
my game!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
So no worries! Just come at me with all
you’ve got...
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: until you’re all rivals of the great Blue!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: I could be Blue’s rival, huh?
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I wanna get stronger to protect my friends,
too!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Yeah! Team Rocket’s been doing lotsa bad
things lately!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Yeah. I heard they’ve been going around
attacking sync pairs on sight.
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: I can’t let that slide. I’ll keep an eye out.
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Sounds like a plan, then! Thanks for being
so reliable!
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
But just so ya know, my Pokémon are all
super strong.
story_arceus_07_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
So don’t be surprised if we take care of
everything before you even arrive!
